duties_responsibilities.duty: Exceed member service expectations in all areas.
Perform janitorial maintenance of the locker room facility, including toilets and showers.
Keep an inventory of towels, toiletries, and paper supplies and return supplies and equipment to the proper place after use.
Provide daily beverage set up and maintain freshness throughout the day.
Assist with food service in the Alexa Sterling and Dot Kirby room.
Fulfill member requests in a courteous and prompt manner.
